languages.text: "Что вы, то было лишь одно из первых тел для растопки Фесмофориуса. Теперь дело пойдет живее". {n}Словно в подтверждение его слов, огнедышащий святой изрыгает сгусток едкого дыма.{/n} "А пока наш герой истлевает, встречайте новых участников нашего действа..."

traits.locale_text: "Что вы, то было лишь одно из первых тел для растопки Фесмофориуса. Теперь дело пойдет живее". {n}Словно в подтверждение его слов, огнедышащий святой изрыгает сгусток едкого дыма.{/n} "А пока наш герой истлевает, встречайте новых кандидатов на сожжение — барона Арголдо де Борвонда и похитительницу сердец, красотку Ронду — собственной персоной!"

languages.text: "That was but one of the first bodies set to stoke the Phesmophorius. It is going to get a lot busier now." {n}As if to confirm the man's words, the fire-breathing saint expels a puff of acrid smoke.{/n} "While the guilty are being reduced to ashes, let us meet the next participants in our performance..."
languages.original_text: "Что вы, то было лишь одно из первых тел для растопки Фесмофориуса. Теперь дело пойдет живее". {n}Словно в подтверждение его слов, огнедышащий святой изрыгает сгусток едкого дыма.{/n} "А пока наш герой истлевает, встречайте новых участников нашего действа..."

traits.locale_text: "That was but one of the first bodies set to stoke the Phesmophorius. It is going to get a lot busier now." {n}As if to confirm the man's words, the fire-breathing saint expels a puff of acrid smoke.{/n} "While our hero is being reduced to ashes, let us meet the next participants in our extravaganza..."

"That was just one of the first bodies to stoke the Phesmophorius, it is going to get a lot busier now." {n}As if to confirm his words, the fire-breathing saint belches out a puff of acrid smoke.{/n} "And while our hero is reduced ashes, welcome the new participants of our performance..."

languages.text: “这仅仅是第一批被菲斯摩弗瑞斯点燃的犯人，接下来的工作要忙得多。”{n}喷火的圣像突然喷出了一股辛辣的烟雾，仿佛在证实刽子手的话一样。{/n}“当那些罪人化为灰烬之时，这场表演的下一位演员就该登场了……”
languages.original_text: "That was but one of the first bodies set to stoke the Phesmophorius. It is going to get a lot busier now." {n}As if to confirm the man's words, the fire-breathing saint expels a puff of acrid smoke.{/n} "While the guilty are being reduced to ashes, let us meet the next participants in our performance..."

traits.locale_text: “这仅仅是第一批被菲斯摩弗瑞斯点燃的犯人，接下来的工作要忙得多。”{n}喷火的圣像突然喷出了一股辛辣的烟雾，仿佛在证实刽子手的话一样。{/n}“当那些罪人化为灰烬之时，这场表演的下一位演员就该登场了……”
“这仅仅是第一批被菲斯摩弗瑞斯点燃的犯人，接下来的工作要忙得多。”{n}喷火的圣像突然喷出了一股辛辣的烟雾，仿佛在证实刽子手的话一样。{/n}“当我们的主角化为灰烬之时，这场表演的下一位演出者就该登场了……”

languages.text: «Ese era uno de los primeros cuerpos que han de avivar las llamas del fesmoforio. A partir de ahora las cosas se van a caldear bastante». {n}Como para confirmar las palabras del hombre, el santo escupefuego vomita una bocanada de humo.{/n} «Mientras los culpables queda reducido a cenizas, conozcamos a los demás participantes del evento de hoy...».
languages.original_text: "That was but one of the first bodies set to stoke the Phesmophorius. It is going to get a lot busier now." {n}As if to confirm the man's words, the fire-breathing saint expels a puff of acrid smoke.{/n} "While the guilty are being reduced to ashes, let us meet the next participants in our performance..."

traits.locale_text: «Ese era uno de los primeros cuerpos que han de avivar las llamas del fesmoforio. A partir de ahora las cosas se van a caldear bastante». {n}Como para confirmar las palabras del hombre, el santo escupefuego vomita una bocanada de humo.{/n} «Mientras los culpables queda reducido a cenizas, conozcamos a los demás participantes del evento de hoy...».

«Ese era uno de los primeros cuerpos que han de avivar las llamas del fesmoforio. A partir de ahora las cosas se van a caldear bastante». {n}Como para confirmar las palabras del hombre, el santo escupefuego vomita una bocanada de humo.{/n} «Mientras nuestro héroe queda reducido a cenizas, conozcamos a los demás participantes del evento de hoy...».

languages.text: "Bu, Pesmoforyus'u körüklemeye ayarlanmış ilk bedenlerden sadece biriydi. Şimdi çok daha yoğun olacak." {n}Sanki adamın sözlerini doğrularcasına ateş püskürten aziz, keskin bir duman bulutu çıkarıyor.{/n} "Suçlular küllere dönüşürken performansımızın sıradaki katılımcılarıyla tanışalım..."
languages.original_text: "That was but one of the first bodies set to stoke the Phesmophorius. It is going to get a lot busier now." {n}As if to confirm the man's words, the fire-breathing saint expels a puff of acrid smoke.{/n} "While the guilty are being reduced to ashes, let us meet the next participants in our performance..."

traits.locale_text: "Bu, Pesmoforyus'u körüklemeye ayarlanmış ilk bedenlerden sadece biriydi. Şimdi çok daha yoğun olacak." {n}Sanki adamın sözlerini doğrularcasına ateş püskürten aziz, keskin bir duman bulutu çıkarıyor.{/n} "Suçlular küllere dönüşürken performansımızın sıradaki katılımcılarıyla tanışalım..."

"Bu, Pesmoforyus'u körüklemeye ayarlanmış ilk bedenlerden sadece biriydi. Şimdi çok daha yoğun olacak." {n}Sanki adamın sözlerini doğrularcasına ateş püskürten aziz, keskin bir duman bulutu çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kahramanımız küllere dönüşürken performansımızın sıradaki katılımcılarıyla tanışalım..."

languages.text: 「あれは、フェスモフォリウスの火を強くするために入れた最初の者の一つに過ぎませんでした。今からもっと忙しくなりますよ」{n}まるで、男の言葉を確認するかのように、火を吐く聖人は一吹きの鼻をつく煙を吐き出す。{/n}「犯罪者が遺灰となりますが、次の執行の参加者に会いたいと思います…」
languages.original_text: "That was but one of the first bodies set to stoke the Phesmophorius. It is going to get a lot busier now." {n}As if to confirm the man's words, the fire-breathing saint expels a puff of acrid smoke.{/n} "While the guilty are being reduced to ashes, let us meet the next participants in our performance..."

traits.locale_text: 「あれは、フェスモフォリウスの火を強くするために入れた最初の者の一つに過ぎませんでした。今からもっと忙しくなりますよ」{n}まるで、男の言葉を確認するかのように、火を吐く聖人は一吹きの鼻をつく煙を吐き出す。{/n}「我々の英雄が遺灰となりますが、次の執行の参加者に会いたいと思います…」
「あれは、フェスモフォリウスの火を強くするために入れた最初の者の一つに過ぎませんでした。今からもっと忙しくなりますよ」{n}まるで、男の言葉を確認するかのように、火を吐く聖人は一吹きの鼻をつく煙を吐き出す。{/n}「我々の英雄が遺灰となりますが、次の執行の参加者に会いたいと思います…」

languages.text: « Ce n'était guère que l'un des premiers condamnés destinés à attiser les flammes du Phesmophorius. Le feu de joie ne fait encore que commencer. » {n}Comme pour confirmer les propos de l'homme, le saint cracheur de feu exhale un panache de fumée âcre.{/n} « Pendant que les coupables se font réduire en cendres, faisons connaissance avec les autres participants de notre auguste spectacle... »
languages.original_text: "That was but one of the first bodies set to stoke the Phesmophorius. It is going to get a lot busier now." {n}As if to confirm the man's words, the fire-breathing saint expels a puff of acrid smoke.{/n} "While the guilty are being reduced to ashes, let us meet the next participants in our performance..."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'était guère que l'un des premiers condamnés destinés à attiser les flammes du Phesmophorius. Le feu de joie ne fait encore que commencer. » {n}Comme pour confirmer les propos de l'homme, le saint cracheur de feu exhale un panache de fumée âcre.{/n} « Pendant que les coupables se font réduire en cendres, faisons connaissance avec les autres participants de notre auguste spectacle... »

« Ce n'était guère que l'un des premiers condamnés destinés à attiser les flammes du Phesmophorius. Le feu de joie ne fait encore que commencer. » {n}Comme pour confirmer les propos de l'homme, le saint cracheur de feu exhale un panache de fumée âcre.{/n} « Pendant que notre héros se fait réduire en cendres, faisons connaissance avec les autres participants de notre auguste spectacle... »

languages.text: "Das war nur einer der ersten Körper, um den Phesmophorius in Gang zu bringen. Gleich geht es richtig los." {n}Wie um die Worte des Mannes zu bestätigen, stößt der feuerspeiende Heilige eine Schwade beißenden Rauchs aus.{/n} "Während die Schuldigen zu Asche zerfallen, lernen wir die nächsten Teilnehmer unserer Darbietung kennen ..."
languages.original_text: "That was but one of the first bodies set to stoke the Phesmophorius. It is going to get a lot busier now." {n}As if to confirm the man's words, the fire-breathing saint expels a puff of acrid smoke.{/n} "While the guilty are being reduced to ashes, let us meet the next participants in our performance..."

traits.locale_text: "Das war nur einer der ersten Körper, um den Phesmophorius in Gang zu bringen. Gleich geht es richtig los." {n}Wie um die Worte des Mannes zu bestätigen, stößt der feuerspeiende Heilige eine Schwade beißenden Rauchs aus.{/n} "Während die Schuldigen zu Asche zerfallen, lernen wir die nächsten Teilnehmer unserer Darbietung kennen ..."

"Das war nur einer der ersten Körper, um den Phesmophorius in Gang zu bringen. Gleich geht es richtig los." {n}Wie um die Worte des Mannes zu bestätigen, stößt der feuerspeiende Heilige eine Schwade beißenden Rauchs aus.{/n} "Während unser Held zu Asche zerfällt, lernen wir die nächsten Teilnehmer unserer Darbietung kennen ..."
